system.description:
The Redeemed can make Cuts under specific situations. How and when you make your Cuts is determined by your What Is The Redeemed? choice.

When you Cut a Threat, it is always a Hard Cut. After you make a Cut against them, they can respond with a Cut. After they Cut you, you may Cut them back if you still meet the trigger for your cuts. Battles between you and a Threat may happen entirely without Moves.

You cannot make Cuts against a Threat to the World.
You cannot make Cuts while you are in Despair.

The Cuts are as follows:

Reveal an unwelcome truth
Tell them something they don't want to hear

Show signs of an approaching threat
Introduce a new danger or complication to the scene

Deal damage
Hurt them, physically or emotionally

Use up or take away their resources
Force them to spend their Gear or supplies

Turn their move back on them
Redirect or punish the move they just made

Separate them
Take them away from their allies

Put someone on the spot
Make a situation that needs their immediate attention or else

Present an opportunity
Give them a chance to succeed or beat you

Show a downside
Take advantage of a weak point in their actions or equipment

Tell them the consequences or requirements
Stop them from doing something they want until they go through you
